case.title: single asian girl ? want to talk! - 25 (queens)
case.text: wasup craigslist,im 25 im white,i do have pix i can send back if you email me,im 6'5,i live in queens,i live alone,i do drive ,i do work,im single and looking for something serious and id like to find a asian girl to talk to and date im cute im a good dresser,very funnny,im a romantic type a guy,let me sweep you off your feet.
